page.title: 03My Sister
page.content: My sister is only two and she is a horror. Whenever she is in my room she turns it into a tip and I have to clear up after her. When I'm playing on the computer, she says she wants the pot and I have to go and get it for her and so I lose the game! Some things my mum had when she was a girl, she gave to me. When I give them to my sister they almost always break. Soon she is going to St.Marychurch playgroup which is quite big. There is a garden, a paddling pool and a sand-pit. There is also a Wendy House and she can do painting. When she is five, she will go to school in the infants' class where I hope things will go very well.
